# API Reference {.doc .doc-index}

## Set Cover

Functions to find minimum weight set covers.

| | |
| --- | --- |
| [cover.wset_cover_RR](cover.wset_cover_RR.qmd#geomcover.cover.wset_cover_RR) | Computes an approximate solution to the weighted set cover problem via randomized rounding. |
| [cover.wset_cover_greedy](cover.wset_cover_greedy.qmd#geomcover.cover.wset_cover_greedy) | Computes an approximate solution to the weighted set cover problem via a greedy approach. |
| [cover.wset_cover_ILP](cover.wset_cover_ILP.qmd#geomcover.cover.wset_cover_ILP) | Computes an approximate solution to the weighted set cover problem via *integer linear programming*. |

## Linear Algebra

Standard linear algebra algorithms.

| | |
| --- | --- |
| [linalg.pca](linalg.pca.qmd#geomcover.linalg.pca) | Projects `X` onto a d-dimensional linear subspace via Principal Component Analysis. |
| [linalg.cmds](linalg.cmds.qmd#geomcover.linalg.cmds) | Generates a d-dimensional a gram matrix 'G' onto  embedding via Classical (Torgerson's) Multi-Dimensional Scaling. |

## Geometry

Algorithms for computing information on manifolds.

| | |
| --- | --- |
| [geometry.tangent_bundle](geometry.tangent_bundle.qmd#geomcover.geometry.tangent_bundle) | Estimates the tangent bundle of 'M' via local PCA on neighborhoods in `X`. |
| [geometry.bundle_weights](geometry.bundle_weights.qmd#geomcover.geometry.bundle_weights) | Computes a geometrically informative statistic on each tangent space estimate of a tangent bundle. |
